[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
RELATIONSHIP
enum RELATIONSHIP {...}

Relationship between (monster) entities

Values
R_AL

(-2) Ally. Good alternative to R_NO when applicable.

R_NO

(0) No relationship. Disregard.

R_DL

(1) Dislike. Will attack.

R_HT

(2) Hate. Will attack this character instead of any DISLIKE'd characters.

R_NM

(3) Nemesis. A monster will ALWAYS attack its nemesis, no matter what.

R_FR

(4) Fear. Will attack.
